alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:41PM CST until January 27 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine For the Bayou Anacoco...including Rosepine...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at noon CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco near Rosepine. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural and forested areas near the bayou will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 17.6 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 5.6 Wed 8 pm CST 17.6 15.8 9.4 &&
